meanings.definition: Not showing or expressing a preference
meanings.sent1: She remained nonpreferential when asked to choose between the two desserts.
meanings.sent2: The teacher's nonpreferential attitude towards students helped create a fair learning environment.
meanings.sent3: Even the cat seemed nonpreferential when presented with two identical toys.
meanings.sent4: The nonpreferential weather made it hard to decide what to wear.
meanings.sent5: His nonpreferential behavior towards all team members earned him respect from everyone.

meanings.definition: Not favoring one option over another
meanings.sent1: The nonpreferential approach to selecting a movie led to a compromise among friends.
meanings.sent2: The judge's nonpreferential decision pleased both parties in the dispute.
meanings.sent3: The nonpreferential vending machine randomly dispensed snacks to the delight of the customers.
meanings.sent4: Her nonpreferential taste in music allowed her to enjoy various genres.
meanings.sent5: The nonpreferential distribution of tasks ensured everyone had an equal workload.

meanings.definition: Not biased towards any particular choice
meanings.sent1: The nonpreferential software recommended products solely based on user input.
meanings.sent2: The committee members remained nonpreferential during the selection process.
meanings.sent3: The nonpreferential coin flip determined who would go first in the game.
meanings.sent4: His nonpreferential view on politics made him a fair moderator.
meanings.sent5: The nonpreferential system ensured equal opportunities for all applicants.
